channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-26992] Select count(*) query fails with error "java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: arraycopy: last source index 1024 out of bounds for int[256]"
item.description:

item.summary: Select count(*) query fails with error "java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: arraycopy: last source index 1024 out of bounds for int[256]"

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Merged to master. Thanks InvisibleProgrammer for the fix and dkuzmenko for review!
